extendedInfo.description: Create a rich fantasy world filled with playful attractions, toy-like interactions and goodie-filled shops! The best-selling Theme Park series is back!**GAME ALERT** Play Bejeweled Blitz. Treat yourself to an exciting take on the world's #1 puzzle game from PopCap! New players Get 100,000 Coins Free. http://smarturl.it/blitzEPIC FANTASY RIDES Build and interact with unreal roller coasters and rides, featuring lush, eye-popping animations. Make them run faster for extra cash!YOUâRE IN CHARGERestock shops and repair rides while your perky patrons enjoy your park. Then upgrade your rides and shops to watch the cash roll in (Theme Park Cash, that is)! ELEVATE THE THRILLS Complete quests to unlock new rides and shops. But why wait? Buy Super Tickets to speed up construction, boost profits, and get new rides faster.Want to be a Theme Park mogul? Have a blast running your own theme park on Android.Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome. We should have one with a town or city. OR AIRPORT THAT WOULD BE COOL
reviews.author: Abby Puckett

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: Great fun! Very addictive, love playing and my kids love playing with the rides.
reviews.author: Laura Gargano

reviews.title: Buying content and not given full amount
reviews.comment: I have bought extra super tickets and park dollars a few times now and it shows me at first that i have it and ill buy a few rides but then next time i go on its back down to what i had before i purchased the extra tix and dollars. If someone is able to fix this and get me my moneys worth back id appreciate it.
reviews.author: Keli Carneiro

reviews.title: Excellent Gameplay
reviews.comment: I have been playing EA\'s Theme Park recently. The rides are diverse and entertaining with lots of different options to choose from.  I keep saving game money for bigger and better rides.  The game gives you game tickets every time you level up and increase the amount of rides available to purchase.  Except for some hefty ticket rides, most rides can be worked onto purchasing.  Also shop booths are available and as diversified as the rides.
reviews.author: Deborah Allen

reviews.title: Enjoy
reviews.comment: Love the game but really would like to be able to buy some if the rides with money instead of tickets, more shops and rides would be nice, and a theme button on the rides would be nice so you can tell what theme they go to. Don\'t mind paying every now and then to advance but not all the time.
reviews.author: anita necaise

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Good game,fun themes. Don\'t like the conatant pop up though. Can\'t add friends on android though so makes reaching goals a lot harder
reviews.author: Sarah Harris

reviews.title: Consecutive Days
reviews.comment: Overall good game, maybe try changing the consecutive days check in prizes to different rewards after you complete the whole 30 days or however many and it starts over, would really appreciate it,
reviews.author: Juliana Sanchez

reviews.title: All of these freaking ads!
reviews.comment: I play alot of apps and I have never seen one besides this one have soooo many ads. I like this game but every 30 seconds these apps to get more super tickets show up! Might uninstall
reviews.author: Shasta Rogers

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Love this game....love it love it love it
reviews.author: Jennifer Barichio

reviews.title: So addictive!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love this game. Would give 5 stars if Origin login was updated for Android devices to allow adding friend parks.
reviews.author: Shaunna Frielings

reviews.title: Reward option needs to stop!
reviews.comment: Just installed this app looks cute but if advertisement continues to pop up every minuet app will be deleted.  Cannot play with this pop up
reviews.author: Stacy Gonzalez

reviews.title: Alright game but not happy with EA
reviews.comment: Made an in game purchase for more cash and it was never credited. Contacted support two weeks ago and STILL WAITING to be reimbursed. Lousy support!!
reviews.author: kacie korsten

reviews.title: Beginning to get annoyed
reviews.comment: The rides needs to create more of a profit... It takes way too long to get back the money you put in for certain rides. Also, I purchased a package and neither my super tickets or cash has loaded into the game. Does it take a couple of days or is this a ripoff?
reviews.author: Ayanna Wu

reviews.title: Fun but needs updates.
reviews.comment: Not a bad game for passing the time. Wish that you could play with friends. And create more rides and shops. Needs Updates to make the game funner.
reviews.author: ryan day

reviews.title: Adds
reviews.comment: I like the game but the adds pop up every second so I can\'t really enjoy playing.  Thinking of uninstalling it
reviews.author: Mary Eckman

reviews.title: Hard to earn super ticket
reviews.comment: This game would be amazing if it was easier to earn the super tickets since it is needed to buy all the cool rides and shops. Please make it easier to earn the.. Otherwise i\'m quite pleased.
reviews.author: Jade Carr

reviews.title: Update killed it
reviews.comment: Sniff. Update ruined my game... After waiting an hour to update got error message that said. \"Cant install on default location\"   Please fix.
reviews.author: Mimi Wilson

reviews.title: This app is fun and addictive you will love it enjoy
reviews.comment: Fun and addictive
reviews.author: mikayah mims

reviews.title: Unplayable
reviews.comment: Howdo they expect anyone to play thisbgame whenevery 30 seconds or so the screen popsup to try and get you to get their \"tickets\"?
reviews.author: Sean Morris

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: I paid for a package and i did not get the package.  They will take your money and u will not get anything in return
reviews.author: Vanessa Krampitz
